inn1.comm: good length outside off stump, Sehwag reaches forward to drive through cover and doesn't time it

dropped! Those chances either stick or they don't, Sehwag drove the ball in the air towards Steyn's left, it was low as well, the ball hit his hand and went towards the off side before Steyn could react properly, Sehwag gets a single and thanks his luck. Tough chance
driven off the front foot towards cover
Steyn is getting the ball to shape away from the right hander, Tendulkar counters by opening the face while driving, he hits it to cover again, Sehwag wants a single but Tendulkar says no
pushed towards the off side on the front foot
played firmly off the front foot back to the bowler, Steyn starts well, it would have been perfect had he held on to that chance
Sehwag tries to work the ball off his hips but can't make contact, fine leg is in the circle
again Sehwag mis-times the drive but he's hit it straight enough to take a single before mid-off runs to his right
too full and outside off stump, Tendulkar drives the half-volley wide of mid off and gets off the mark in style
another half-volley, this time on the pads, and Tendulkar leans across and clips it crisply through midwicket, consecutive boundaries
shorter length, Tendulkar stays on the back foot and punches on the off side
short of a length on the hipds, Tendulkar goes deep into his crease and whips the ball through square leg, van der Merwe chases and slides, keeping the batsmen to two
short and wide, Sehwag cuts hard but there's protection on the point boundary
shorter ball, Tendulkar swivels to pull but doesn't connect well, he gets a single towards wide mid-on
one bounce, two, three and the ball goes for four! Sehwag stands his ground and lofts a length delivery straight down the ground with success
good comeback, the bouncer at 140kph, Sehwag tries to hook but misses, Boucher takes it at head height
too close to cut, that was heading for off stump, Sehwag jabs down at it and plays it behind point
oh lovely lovely shot, Tendulkar leans forward and flicks the ball from off stump through the gap between square leg and midwicket, extraordinary wrist work
Sehwag tries to blast the ball through the off side but finds Duminy, he's in some trouble after stopping that and runs off, Botha comes on as a sub
played to wide mid-on for a single
full wide and a touch slower outside off stump, Tendulkar tries to run it to third man but misses
this time the length is shorter and Tendulkar has enough space to play to third man

caught! Sehwag aims to hit down the ground and his bottom hand comes off the bat as he makes contact, the ball flies off the edge towards third man, Steyn takes a few steps back and holds the catch on the boundary
short of a length on leg and middle, Karthik nudges towards the leg side and wants one, Tendulkar sends him back
played off the front foot towards short cover

played towards mid-on and what's happened there? One of the South African fielders has gone down, looks like the ball hit him in the face. Langeveldt was moving towards the ball and he slipped. the ball hit him above the eye and he is bleeding
short ball, and Tendulkar pulls it through the gap at midwicket for four
good ball, Steyn beats the outside edge with some away movement, Tendulkar tried to drive on the up but missed
well placed, Tendulkar eases forward and drives the ball between mid off and extra cover, Peterson give chase and pulls the ball in before the boundary
Tendulkar drives along the ground towards the howler, Steyn picks up on his follow through and rolls it back to the batsman
defended on the back foot towards the off side
short ball, and Karthik ducks under it
fuller length angling across the right-hander, Karthik drives off the front foot to short cover
defended on the front foot towards point
short ball and Karthik gets going with a crisp pull to the boundary, he took that from middle and off and placed it perfectly
consecutive boundaries, with a lovely whip off the hips through midwicket
Tendulkar strides forward and punches a length delivery from Steyn towards mid-off
Tendulkar plays the square drive in the air but well over the fielder at point for another boundary
he closes the face this time, a touch too early to play on the leg side, and the leading edge nearly carries to cover
too straight and Tendulkar misses out on loose ball, fine leg was in the circle but Tendulkar missed the glance and got hit on the pad
played to mid-on, who is on the 30-yard circle, for a quick single
length delivery outside off, left alone by Karthik
that's too straight again and Tendulkar plays the ball wide of the fielder at mid-on, Amla gives chase
Tendulkar makes a bit of room and thumps the ball through cover with a powerful drive off the front foot, nobody moved

spectacular fielding! van der Merwe sprints along the boundary from deep square leg, dives full length with his right hand outstretched and pulls the ball in, his back touched the rope at some point but was his hand in contact with the ball? I don't think so, terrific effort. Tendulkar flicked that firmly by the way
played to third man for one
defended on the front foot towards cover
played with softer hands towards cover and Karthik keeps strike
Karthik takes a step forward and punches towards cover
fuller ball on off stump, Karthik comes forward and drives back towards Steyn who gets a hand on it
lucky shot! Karthik tries to cut when there's no real room outside off, he gets an inside edge that misses off stump and beats Boucher
that's cleared the square leg boundary! Karthik leaned forward and picked a length ball up off his pads and deposited it into the stands, lovely timing
played towards mid off for a single
Tendulkar moves back and across and plays the ball towards square leg
Parnell comes round the wicket and angles the ball into the right-hander, Tendulkar comes forward to meet the ball and splits the gap between point and cover with an outstanding drive
Tendulkar comes out again and runs the ball towards third man
Karthik pushes forward and tries to play towards point but misses
driven off the front foot towards point
Tendulkar makes room again to punch the ball delivered from round the wicket, this time he finds the man at cover
full and wide outside off stump, Tendulkar waits in his crease and steers the ball towards the backward point boundary
full ball outside off stump, Karthik drives and places the ball wide of the fielder at third man
played off the back foot towards point
excellent line and length, angling into off stump, Karthik stays in his crease and defends
driven off the front foot to the fielder on the cover boundary
full toss on off stump, Tendulkar smashes it into the ground towards cover, Gibbs flies to his right and pulls the ball down
short of a length outside off stump, Karthik tries to guide to third man but misses
full toss on middle stump, Tendulkar paddles but can't beat short fine leg
defended on the leg side
Tendulkar makes room and drives a full ball to cover point
too far on leg stump and this time Tendulkar beats short fine leg with the leg glance, the ball runs away to the boundary and Tendulkar celebrates a half-century
Tendulkar makes room by moving towards leg and drives on the off side
full ball angling into the right-hander from round the wicket, Karthik drives to long off
driven off the front foot towards cover
worked through square leg for a single
length delivery angling into the right-hander, Tendulkar punches back past the bowler, mid-on runs to his left to field
Tendulkar tries to whack a length delivery over the leg side but misses, he gets hit on the leg
Tendulkar leans forward and glides the ball behind the man at point, Amla runs across from third man and dives to make the save
a slower ball but Langeveldt strays down leg side and that's the first wide of the day
Langeveldt goes wide of the crease and angles the ball into Tendulkar, he uses the angle to play to midwicket, there's a fumble but it doesn't cost South Africa anything
Tendulkar plays the ball off his pads through square leg
defended on the off side
defended back to the bowler
Karthik flicks and gets a single towards short fine leg
worked towards Amla at deep square leg for a single
Tendulkar uses the angle into him to drive the ball through midwicket, it's a bit in the air but falls short of Kallis at midwicket, the ball bounces awkwardly and hits Kallis' knee and goes past him
played towards short cover where there's another fumble
that's lofted on the up and over mid-off for four, Tendulkar got under the ball and simply hit through the line with a straight bat
Langeveldt bowls a slower ball drifting on to leg stump, Tendulkar misses the glance again with fine leg in the circle
there's an appeal for lbw as Karthik misses the flick and gets hit on the pad, that was missing leg stump
flicked off the pads towards square leg for a single, India reach 100
defended towards the bowler, van der Merwe dives to his right but the ball goes through him
Tendulkar makes room and drives the ball inside out over extra cover for four
he takes a single to point this time
played to deep backward square for one
Tendulkar paddles the ball towards short fine leg for a single
worked off the pads towards deep square
short of a length outside off stump, Karthik stands tall and plays the ball towards point
steered off the back foot towards third man for a single
driven down the ground to long on for a single
Karthik steps out and drives on the up towards cover
good length and straight, Karthik defends towards the bowler
slower ball on middle stump, Karthik defends on the leg side, time for the first drinks break
driven off the front foot towards deep point
Tendulkar steps out to van der Merwe, takes the ball on the full, and drives inside out to deep cover
Karthik tries to work the ball on the leg side but doesn't make good contact
played off the front foot towards midwicket, five fielders on the leg side
Karthik waits in his crease and plays the ball through square leg
tossed up on middle stump, nudged towards point for one more
played off the back foot towards midwicket
Tendulkar stays in his crease and rolls his wrists to play the ball through square
the short ball and Karthik sways out of the line of the delivery
driven off the front foot towards mid on
the slower ball angling into the right hander, Tendulkar waits and dabs towards third man
Karthik steps forward and pulls a shorter ball towards wide long on for a single, oh they come back for the second
played towards cover on the front foot
Tendulkar rotates strike with a clip off his pads
pushed towards long on for another single
Tendulkar makes room and pushes the ball towards cover
played off the back foot towards long on and that brings up the 100 partnership off 96 balls.
lofted over the infield over extra cover for four! Terrific execution after making room
short of a good length on middle, worked away off his hips behind square leg for a single
shortish outside off, waits and then dabs it down to third man for a single
short of a good length on middle and leg, clipped off his pads towards deep square leg
singles being picked off easily, angling it in towards middle and leg, played down the ground to long-on for a single
banged it short on middle, rocked back and dropped it in front of midwicket for a quick run
short outside off, and again and he angles it down towards third man for a single
sliding it down the leg side, goes for the sweep, misses
comes down the track to whip it past mid-on, gets an inside edge onto the pads
deft touch, sliding it on the pads and he just closes the pace to tickle it past short fine leg to the ropes, quick outfield, this
nudged into the leg side wide of midwicket for a single
shortish on middle and leg, closes the face and turns it wide of square leg for a single
dropped into the leg side and they steal a single
short of a good length on the off, knocks it down in front of point
bowling from wide of the crease and targeting middle and leg, clipped off his pads to fine leg for a single
getting it to move in just a hint, Karthik gets across and tries to force it past midwicket, gets a thick inside edge behind square leg for a single
back of a length on the off, moves across and drops it into the leg side
reversing a little there, gets forward and pushes it past the bowler towards mid-off
shortish on middle and leg, whipped off the back foot for a single
flat and short on middle, nudged away in the direction of square leg for one more
short of a good length on middle and leg, coming round the wicket, knocked down towards deep square leg for a single
Sachin gets a couple to get into the 90s, short of a length, cuts it past point into the deep
tossed it up on the off, gets front and across and drives it to mid-on
flighted outside off, bent low to sweep it square, missed but his foot didn't leave the crease
short of a length outside off, goes for the cut, he favours that shot, gets an inside edge to the keeper on the bounce
nice improvisation, came down the track, took it off a length and creamed it past mid-off for a boundary
fifty for Karthik, turns it around towards square leg for a single, his fourth half-century in ODIs
short of a good length on middle, turns it away towards square leg, one more
slightly short outside off, dabs it down towards third man for a single
short and down the leg side, Tendulkar gets out of the way, another extra conceded
short of a good length outside off, guided down to third man for one run
flighted on middle, pushes it straight back to the bowler
angling it towards middle and off, gets a slight leading edge as he turns the face but checks his shot
tickled it into the leg side for a single, inching towards another landmark is Tendulkar
flighted outside off, steers it towards short third, enough time to sneak a single

appeal for stumping,. pushed it wide of the off stump, Tendulkar tries to seize on the chance, attempts a drive through the covers, misses and Boucher takes off the bails, he had his foot in the air for just a slight moment but got it down just in time before the bails were taken off, the third umpire says NOT Out and the crowd cheers
swept away towards deep square leg for a single to keep the strike
slightly short outside off, taps it down towards third man for a single
slower one bowled short outside off, cuts it hard but straight to point
slower one bowled short outside off, Karthik is too early into the pull, misses
it's a small ground and he takes full toll, bowled full and he gets across to swing it over deep midwicket, that's quite discouraging for the bowler, was actually a slog-sweep
turned away in the direction of deep midwicket for a single
slower one bowled full outside off, bends low and steers it down to third man for a single
flighted on the off, turns the face to play it towards midwicket
slightly short on middle and leg, turned towards square leg for a single
swept away towards deep square leg
worked off the back foot behind square leg for one more, on 99 now
slaps it off the back foot to long-off for a single to raise the 150 stand
yet another century for Tendulkar, his third on this South African tour of India, gets on the back foot and cracks that short delivery to point to bring up his 46th ODI ton
smashed, seizes on the short one, gets forward and flays it past mid-on and midwicket for a boundary
fullish outside off, opens the face and steers it well but straight to point
punished, bowled full on the off stump and he smashes it back over the bowler's head for another four, excellent bat speed
the bat turns in his hand as he plays it past the bowler, sneaks in a quick single
Karthik, meanwhile, continues doing what he's done for the bulk of this partnership, pinches a single to long-on
came to him a little quicker than he would have liked, had shaped himself up for a pull but was late to play it, missed
short on middle and he gets into position early, moving back and pulling him over deep midwicket for a six, came off the meat
fires it towards middle, worked away past midwicket for a single
out comes the sweep, shuffles across and sweeps it towards deep square leg for a single
a horrendous fulltoss that is duly dispatched, waist high and he pulls it over square leg to beat the fielder in the deep to the ropes
short of a good length on the off, punched to extra cover off the back foot
bowls it full on the off, digs it out in the leg side
angling it towards middle, plays it back to the bowler
eased off the front foot to extra cover
tossed up on middle, drives it hard towards a widish long-on for a single
bowls it straight on middle, checks his shot as he plays it back to the bowler
flighted on the off, pushed off the front foot towards extra cover
driven down the ground towards long-off, raises India's 200
tossed up on the off, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
that's disappeared, bowled it flat but Tendulkar was committed to that shot, charged down the ground, picked it off a good length and smacked it over long-on into the stands
short on the off, pushed wide of point for a single
fires it short on the off, punched back to the bowler from the crease
tossed up on the off, driven towards long-on for a single

Duminy was lucky to not get his hands to that one though he did give it a try, bowled it full on the off, Tendulkar charged forward and drilled it hard past Duminy, over the umpire's head, for another four
short of a good length on the off, driven wide of extra cover for a single
made room, the bowler saw him do that, bowled it short in the off, Tendulkar punched it towards long-off
chops it past point for another single
attempting another hit into the stands but didn't get hold of that one, straight to long-on for a single
gets forward and defends it back down the pitch
swept away towards deep square leg for a single
and starts with a wide, comes round the wicket and drags it short but down the leg side
short of a good length on the off, defended back down the pitch
the bowling change works, bowled it short on the off and Karthik, instinctively, went for the pull but didn't get hold of that one as well some of the previous ones, straight to Gibbs at midwicket
short of a good length on the off, defended towards cover
shot off the pitch, landed on middle and just drifted down slightly, the batsman let it go and the umpire, rightly, didn't call it a wide
short of a good length on middle, defended solidly back down the pitch
bowled it short on the off, eased it towards point from the crease
bowled it full on the off, steered towards point
attempted yorker there but ends up being a full toss on middle, flicked away from the crease between square leg and short fine for a boundary
had made room there and Steyn slipped it wide, Tendulkar had to reach for it but was unable to get to it
making him reach again, fullish outside off and Tendulkar is tempted to go for the drive given the field is up, misses yet again

superbly played, had picked his spot, two misses outside off followed by one where he walked across and flicked past midwicket and square leg, almost identical delivery as the previous two but Sachin had a strategy in place this time
gets it in the blockhole this time, digs it out towards cover, snatches a single
quick single taken, angling it in from round the wicket and he makes room to push it just wide of extra cover
short on middle and leg , tries to help it on its way fine, manages a single as it strikes his pads
yorker on the off, dug out with ease into the leg side for another single
bowled it short on middle, worked away off the back foot towards fine leg for a single
made room, it was pitched full on the off stump and he crashed it over extra cover to the ropes, he's piling it on now
much fuller and on the stumps this time, makes room to play it back to the bowler, Parnell throws the ball down the pitch in frustration
just a flick, not for the first time has Steyn bowled a full toss, on middle and leg and Yusuf helps it between fine leg and deep square leg, fell just short of the ropes
he's cashing in now, short outside off and out comes the upper cut, played it over the keeper's head for another boundary, entirely deliberately and wonderfully executed
aiming for the yorker again but ends up being a low full toss that Yusuf flicks to deep square leg for a single
full on the off, beautifully timed and he picked the gap to perfection, almost a yorker there but he turned the face in time to place it through midwicket for classy boundary
slower one banged in short on middle and leg, Tendulkar had made up his mind, made room and tried the upper cut, missed it
the interruption has no effect on Tendulkar, short and wide, he makes room to caress it through point and cover
don't bowl length to Yusuf, in the slot on the off stump and he launches it into the stands over long-on
short on middle and leg, worked away towards fine leg for a single

150 for Tendulkar, made room there and the bowler followed him, bowled it full on middle and leg and he chipped it over midwicket and it had enough legs on it to take it to the ropes, more delight for the capacity crowd
short on middle, swivels and sends it down to fine leg for a single
Yusuf has gone berserk, short on middle and he gets into position early enough to send the poor thing into the stands over deep square leg, thumped
nice comeback, follows that up with a yorker that Yusuf can only manage to dig out back to the bowler
and gets punished, full and wide and he caresses it through point and cover for another boundary
bowled it wide of the crease and altered his length there, bowled it slightly shorter, Tendulkar played it back to Langeveldt
short of a length outside off and it's too wide, beats Tendulkar's reach but it's called a wide
timed it beautifully but there was a fielder in the deep, full outside off, played it uppishly but on the bounce to Amla at deep cover
full and wide, Yusuf has no trouble slicing it hard over point to find the boundary, no bowler being spared here
short of a length outside off, goes for the cut but misses much to the crowd's disappointed
hurls it in the blockhole on middle, digs it out towards mid-on to take a single and end a highly productive Powerplay, with no damage done
full toss on middle, a low one, plays it back to the bowler
full on the off, driven hard and straight down to long-off for a single
nicely played but Kallis was alert at short third, full toss and he opened the face to carve it wide of Kallis but a dive prevents any runs

appeal for run out, worked away off the front foot past square leg, Tendulkar calls for the second, it's a good throw from Amla in the deep and Boucher takes off the bails but Tendulkar stretches hard to make it back just in time, just a matter of a frame there, NOT OUT is the decision and the crowd, which has its eyes set on another milestone, heaves a sigh of relief
tossed up outside off, comes down the track and drives it wide of extra cover for a a single
good over from van der Merwe, full on middle, almost in the blockhole, played it back to the bowler
Tendulkar is cramping as he's taking a run, punched down towards long-on for a single
Pwerplay or not, makes no difference to Yusuf, bowls it on a good length and he swings it over midwicket for a boundary, no fielder in the deep picked it however, were very late to react
short of a good length on middle, pushed away past midwicket for a single
bowls it on a length outside off, heaved towards deep midwicket for a single
yorker length on the off, drills it towards long-off for a single
cross-batted heave, quite uncharacteristic of Tendulkar but he's in his zone today, slightly short on the off and he shovels it into the crowd behind deep midwicket, brings up the 300

plenty of bottom-hand in that shot but didn't get the elevation he wanted there, low full toss on the off, ends up drilling it straight to AB de Villiers who's at the edge of the circle at extra cover
flighted on the off, caned down the ground to long-off
full toss on the off, slaps it down to long-on for a single
quicker on middle, worked away wide of square leg for a single
absolutely hammered, bowled it on a length on middle, makes room and kills it over the bowler's head for a one bounce four
Tendulkar's plundering the visitors here, goes past Kapil Dev's 175 with a thunderous six over long-off, not quite there to hit but he knew where it was heading
short of a good length on the off, punched towards deep cover for a single
had shaped himself for another big one there but Kallis bowls a quickish full toss, pushed down the ground to long-on
short and wide, cut away towards point, no run there
Dhoni tries to swing that over short fine but can't, gets a single nevertheless and that is what the crowd wants
full outside off, steered just wide of point, AB throws at the striker's end, misses and concedes an overthrow
Tendulkar equals his highest ODI score, a terrible full toss on middle, worked away wide of short fine all the way to the ropes
smashed but there's cover in the deep, pulled to deep square leg
he's overtaken his previous best with a flick to deep square leg for a single, 187 now
targeting the blockhole, dug out back to the bowler
short of a length on the off, Dhoni gets back and pulls it over midwicket for a boundary
four more, full outside off this time and he cracks it hard over extra cover for another hit to the fence
keeps the strike, bowled on a length on middle, driven hard down the ground for a single to long-on
low full toss on middle, drilled down to long-on
shuffled across and flicked it past the bowler, wide of long-on, enough time for him to scamper back for the second, Dhoni responds well
Enters the 190s, full on the off, flicked away towards deep square leg for a single
yorker length on middle, makes room and drags it to long-on for a single
full toss on the off, pushed gently in front of extra cover for a single, he's not going to let this go now
Dhoni's whiplash is out again, ends up playing it to deep square leg, dug out a good yorker there, keeps the strike
Dhoni strikes that down the ground to long-off, there's a fumble but they don't take the second
he gets two more, short of a length, works it away behind deep square leg for a couple of runs

he's reached the record, the highest score in ODIs, fullish on the pads, flicks it away behind short fine and the crowd erupts as he scampers back for the second. Yet another feather in the master's cap. And another one waiting just five runs away, Boucher comes forward and shakes his hand but Tendulkar's holding his celebration for a while later. Tremendous effort
plays a textbook guide behind point for a single
Dhoni thrashes that fullish delivery over the bowler's head for a boundary, the punishment continues
targeting the pads, fullish and he flicks it away disdainfully over deep square leg for another maximum
doing it in singles is the man, short of a good length, moves back and pats it wide of point for a single
Steyn bowls a superb yorker, full and fast and Dhoni does well to dig it out
a horrendous full toss, clearly slipped out there, over waist height and Dhoni pulls it to deep square leg, no-ball for height
oooh, a bit of a leading edge there, full on middle and leg, moved across to work it fine, ended up going back to the bowler
full on the off, shuffles and works it past midwicket for a single
Dhoni continues unabated, short of a length on the off, shovels it over the bowler's head for a couple of bounces before it crashes into the hoardings
low full toss outside off, thumped down the ground to long-off to keep the strike
yorker outside off, dug out in front of the keeper
bowled it on a length outside off, smashed it towards long-on for a single
and defends! Lands on a good length and presents the full face as he respectfully plays it back to the bowler
full toss on middle, punches it towards wide long-on for a single, reaches 199, Dhoni doesn't want the second, and he's right
refuses the single, full toss outside off, cracked it to extra cover who returns a good throw to the bowler to prevent a run
full outside off, the whiplash again, drills it to long-off for a single to keep the strike
full and wide, reaches to dab that wide of point, misses
that's disappeared into the crowd, full toss for the umpteenth time by Steyn who swings that into the stands over deep midwicket, all power there
short and wide, reaches to play the upper cut, misses, not called a wide, marginal call there
four more, short on middle and leg and he pulls it away, it goes off the glove past the keeper to the fine-leg boundary
six more, Dhoni reaches his fifty in style, bludgeons that mercilessly into the crowd, full and wide and he crashes the poor thing over long-off
Dhoni keeps the strike for the last over, his partner's on 199, drilled down the ground to long-off for a single
but Dhoni's holding them up, full and wide and it was all wrist this time, just a jab at it sails over the wide long-off boundary, into the stands again
swings it away wide of  deep midwicket, every chance of a second as Amla dives to his left but Tendulkar and Dhoni agree mutually to just stick to a single

single to reach the first double-hundred in ODIs, streered behind point, takes off his helmet and waves to the crowd, which is on its feet, so are his team-mates in the dressing room, a fan's blowing a conch, Tendulkar's soaking all the adulation and after a brief moment, gets back to his crease to face the next delivery
four more, slices it past a diving point to the boundary to inch closer to 400
smacked hard, powerfully struck  towards deep midwicket, but the single is turned down by Tendulkar
full and wide and on a day of records and milestones, Dhoni continues the trend, powering that yorker-length delivery to the long-off boundary

inn2.comm: swinging in towards middle and leg, worked wide of mid-on for a single, South Africa are away
short of a good length on the off, defended with a full face towards extra cover
full and wide and Gibbs readies himself for the big task with a brutal cover drive, uppish but safe
short of a good length on middle, defended towards midwicket from the crease
short of a good length outside off, guided down to third man for a single
short of a good length outside off, nipped back in, tries to force it past cover, misses
turned away through square leg for a single
gets a thin inside edge towards fine leg for a single, Nehra smiles at his moral victory
bowled it on a good length on the off, worked away off the front foot towards midwicket
cashes in on a short delivery bowled on middle, pulled away hard over midwicket for a boundary

short of a length outside leg stump, a poor line from Nehra, Amla helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary to bring up 500 runs in internationals on this tour, following up on his superb performance in the Tests
bowled on a good length on middle and off, pushed back with a full face back to the bowler
South Africa have suffered a major blow, short outside off and moving away and Gibbs tries to be a little cheeky, attempted to paddle it fine, gets an inside edge and it lands on the stumps
bowled it on a good length outside off, pushed it firmly wide of mid-off for a single
kept a little low there, shortish on the off and moved away a hint, got a thin edge but landed just short of Dhoni who fumbled
short of a good length on the off, punched hard towards short point who does well to stop that
gets forward and defends it wide of cover for a single
shortish and slides down leg, tries to whip it fine, missed and it's called a wide
on middle and leg, worked away off the back foot into the leg side
crisply struck, lands on a good length outside off, crunches it hard past a diving extra cover to the ropes
short of a good length, punched from the crease wide of cover
swinging in towards middle and leg, shuffles across just a hint and whips it through midwicket for another boundary
lands it on a  good length outside off, pushes at it off the front foot, gets a thick outside edge and it races away to the vacant third-man boundary
four more, deliberate this time, gets across and guides it past slip and point, there's a massive gap and earns four more
powered into the stands, full outside off, he takes a couple of steps forward while simultaneously making a bit of room and swings it over deep midwicket
short of a length on the off, punched from the crease towards extra cover
short of a length outside off, cuts it hard towards point but straight to the fielder
almost had him there, shot back in from a short of a length outside off, did well to chop it down after shaping for a cut
bowls it on a good length outside off, drags it in the direction of long-on for a single
Roelof is showing some spunk, Sreesanth lands it on a good length on middle and he flicks it away to beat deep square leg
goes for a slog, that's what he's sent out to do, short on the off and he tries to dispatch it over midwicket, gets a thick outside edge that lands short of point
slightly short on the off, drops it in the direction of point from the crease
Roelof's stay ends, comes down the track and tries to heave it over square leg, ends up, like he very often does, miscuing it into the off side, lands safely in the palms of Raina at cover
short on the off, tries to pull it past midwicket, mistimes it, decides against the single
bowled it on a length on the off, Amla's looking sublime, driving it through the line past a diving mid-off for a boundary
angles it in front of middle and leg, works away towards deep square leg for a single
short of a good length on middle, defended towards midwicket from the crease
short of a good length outside off, zips away to beat the outside edge as Kallis tries to force it from the crease
slightly short on middle, worked away past square leg for a single
four more, shuffles across to that shortish delivery just a fraction outside leg stump, looks to turn it fine, it clips the pads and rolls down the fine-leg fence
short of a length on the off, guided from the crease towards point for a single
short of a good length on middle, punched past the bowler to long-on for a single
shortish outside off, waits for it and taps it down to third man for a single
The in-form Amla goes, short outside off and he goes for the pull but gets it high on the bat and finds Nehra at mid-on, South Africa in trouble
short of a good length outside off, chops it towards point
chops it from the crease behind point for a single
short of a length outside off, bends low to play the cut but is not quickly onto it, misses
just a punch, short of a good length and he eases that past a diving extra cover all the way to the fence, superb timing
bowls it slightly short on the off, presents the full face while knocking it back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, mistimes a cut to point
slower through the air, angling it towards middle and leg, turned towards square leg for a couple of runs
excellent shot, short of a length on the off, punches it hard down the ground with a full face to beat Praveen and race to the boundary, exquisite timing
lands on a good length outside off, gets it to move away, Kallis lets it through to the keeper
freehit coming as Sreesanth oversteps
smashed, lands on a length, Kallis makes room and carts that over extra cover for a boundary
short of a length, punched from the crease towards point
swinging in, Kallis walks across and drives it towards mid-on
short of a good length on the off, defended from the crease towards extra cover
shot, full outside off, Kallis moves across and drives it handsomely past mid-on for a boundary
lands on a good length on middle, gets forward to drive it through extra cover, gets an inside edge onto his pads
shortish and too wide, reaches for it but misses, wide enough to be called though
he's dragged it on! Short of a good length outside off and it kept a little low, tried to crack it hard past point, got an inside edge straight onto the stumps
short of a length outside off, tries to chop it past point, misses
missed run-out, gets across and taps it to point, thinks of a single but there's no response from the other end, the fielder aims at the stumps but misses, Alviro would have been out
gets forward and taps it towards point from the crease
short and wide, mistimes it wide of mid-off, no single on offer there
bowled it full on middle, driven off the front foot to mid-on, they sneak in a quick single
short on middle, pulls it away but straight to short fine
short of a good length outside off, holds its line and he shoulders arms to allow it to the keeper
four, sliding it on middle and leg, walks across, closes the face and turns it past short fine leg to the boundary
oversteps, short of a good length, well he hasn't really overstepped, a part of his foot was inside the crease, guided to third man for a single but a freehit coming now
full and wide, in the slot for the batsman, makes room and slices it over point to the ropes, takes full toll of the extra ball
short outside off and too wide, he tries to reach it but can't
short of a good length on middle, worked away off the back foot through square leg for a single
gets across and defends it back to the bowler
bowls it on a good length on the off, defended from the crease towards cover
worked away from the crease through square leg into the deep for a single
fullish on leg stump, flicked away towards deep square leg for one more
shortish outside off, eased wide of cover for a single to raise 100
flighted on the off, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
held back his length there, Peterson came down the track and knocked it down into the leg side
shortish on middle, keeps a little low, clips it off his pads through square leg for a couple
slightly short again, moves back and taps it back down the pitch
fires it short on the off, comes on much quicker than Peterson expected, he shaped up for a pull but was a little late onto the shot, missed and the stumps took a thrashing
lands it on a length on middle, driven through the line to long-on for a single

another one falls! Coming round the wicket and Yusuf fires it on middle and off, angling in, Duminy gets forward to defend but it's pushed in quick and he misses, is rapped on the pads and appears to be struck in line, the umpire had no doubt and raised his finger immediately, people who have followed this series will not be surprised by the way he was out
defended into the leg side from the crease
played in the direction of long-on for a single
full toss on middle, driven towards wide long-on for one more
short of a length on the off, punched to long-off for a single
slips it down the leg side, tries to work it square, misses, but it's called a wide
flighted on the off, driven back to the bowler
lands on a good length on the off, defended onto the pitch
pushed off the front foot back to the bowler
short of a good length on the off, worked away through midwicket for a single
turned away towards short fine, no single on offer there
flighted on middle, played back to the bowler
flighted outside off, pitched up and he leans into the drive and executes a classy cover-drive, picked the gap perfectly, four more amid the ruins
tossed up on the off, played back to the bowler
driven through the line towards long-on for a single
targeting middle and leg, it's clipped towards deep square leg for one more
short of a length on the off, he punishes it over midwicket for a one bounce four
tossed up on the off, driven back to the bowler
flighted outside off, eased off the front foot towards deep cover for a single
pitched it full on the off, driven to extra cover
short of a length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
angling it towards middle, played down the ground towards mid-off
landing on middle and leg, played away to square leg
pushed back to the bowler from the crease
short of a length on the off, gets a thick outside edge to point as he tried to force that off the back foot
comes down the track and works it past midwicket for a single
flighted outside off, driven hard towards deep cover for a single
short of a length on leg stump, worked away towards deep square leg for a single
flighted outside off, driven straight to extra cover
shortish on middle and leg, worked towards midwicket from the crease
angling in towards middle, gets a stride out and defends it to extra cover
appeal for lbw, comes down the track, Jadeja slips it flat and quick, is struck on the pads as he tries to defend but he was way forward
flighted outside off, pushed firmly down the ground to long-off for a single

turning in from a good length outside off and raps de Villiers on the pads as he tries to play that across the line, struck him in line but would that have gone on? The appeal is turned down, might have just gone down
pushed down the ground to long-on for a single
flighted on the off, dug out back to the bowler
worked away off the front foot wide of midwicket
played towards extra cover, a bit of a leading edge that as he had turned the face
flighted on the off, pushed back to the bowler, excellent stuff from Yusuf
gets forward and taps it back to the bowler
slipped out of Jadeja's hands there, rolled down the pitch and Boucher tried to smack that behind square but missed! So did Dhoni, but it's a wide
cracks it down towards long-on for a single
short of a length on the off, punched towards Raina at extra cover, he slides to his left, picks it up and hurls it at the non-striker's end in one motion, well fielded but can't stop the single
oversteps, pushed back down the pitch, freehit time
bowled'im but off a freehit so it doesn't count, short on middle and it keeps low, Boucher goes after it, trying to pull, misses and is bowled
gets a single in the direction of cover point
turning in from a good length, tries to drop it on the off side, gets an inside edge onto his pads, 14 off 30

he's given lbw! Turned in from the off stump as he bent low to sweep it fine, it seemed to strike him in line, if that didn't hit the bat he's a gonner, but we need replays to confirm that. The umpire certainly thought, after a bit of a pause, that there was no contact with the bat. We need to have another look at that, replays show there was no bat involved, would have gone on to hit middle and leg
hurling it on middle, plays it towards midwicket
defended watchfully into the off side
firing it on middle, presents the full face as he plays it back to the bowler
short of a length on the off, punches it back to the bowler who misfields and allows them to take a couple
tossed up outside off, pushed through to extra cover
whipped away through deep square leg for a single
short of a length outside off, kept low as he tried to play the cut, missed and Dhoni fumbled
short of a length, chops it towards point, they scamper through for a single
short of a good length on middle, comes down the track and works it towards midwicket
bowled it full on leg stump, driven towards deep midwicket for a single
short of a good length on middle, pushed to midwicket from the crease
driven through the line to long-on for a single
short of a length outside off, cuts it straight to point
short of a length on middle, punched back to the bowler
tosses it up on leg stump, pushed down towards long-on for a single
pushed it off the front foot a little uppishly into the leg side
punched back to the bowler from the crease
struck on the pads, angling in but it would have gone down
short of a length outside off, cut away to deep point for a single
comes down the track and pushes it just in front of midwicket for a single
slightly short on middle, slaps it towards midwicket
flighted on the off, driven towards long-on for a single
angling it towards midwicket for a single
chopped in the direction of point
pushed off the front foot back to the bowler
appeal for lbw, rapped on the pads, fired it short and it kept really low but it would have gone down leg
a release, finally, de Villiers came down the track and lofted it cleanly over long-off for a massive six
short of a length on middle, makes room and chops it towards point
played uppishly towards midwicket, lands short of the fielder
played back to the bowler off the front foot
dropped it short outside off, knocked it down towards short third for a quick single
whipped from the crease towards deep square leg for a single
low full toss on the off, pushed towards midwicket
fired it quick, low full toss on middle, played to midwicket again
presents the full face and drives it back to the bowler
shortish on middle, cracked to midwicket from the crease
short on the off, punches it towards long-on for one more
smacked above midwicket for a couple of runs to reach his half-century, hardly any reaction from anyone
pushed away past midwicket for a single
shortish on middle, punches it back to the bowler
gets outside the line to drive it past cover, gets an inside edge onto the pads
shortish, crunched past the bowler for a single
short of a length on middle, swats it towards deep midwicket
flighted on the off, driven hard through midwicket for a boundary, Virat Kohli in the deep did not pick it, was running in the opposite direction
four more, no such confusion this time I don't think, flighted outside off, driven hard through extra cover and long-off for a boundary
targeting the pads, works away behind square for a single
comes down the track and plays it to mid-on for a quick single
flighted on the off, pushes it straight to midwicket
gets forward and drives it straight to extra cover
AB's doing the best he can here, short on the off, slapped hard over midwicket for a boundary
comes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
worked away straight to midwicket
hurls it down the leg side, a wide
continues to get runs, whips it hard past the in-field to the deep midwicket boundary
short and wide down the leg side, called by the umpire
nudges it in the direction of square leg for a single
short of a length on middle, punched towards long-on for a single
bowls it on a length on middle, driven towards midwicket
short of a good length on the off and nipping back in, appears to have defended it to the off side, Nehra though thinks he was struck on the pads and appeals but has no support from the rest
Parnell raises the 50-stand with a cracking drive on the up, past mid-off for a boundary
short of a good length on middle, played away to midwicket
bowls it short down the leg side and it's called a wide, plenty in the Indian innings so far
pushed off the front foot towards mid-on, no single there
short of a length outside off, flirts with it, misses
pushed of the front foot to long-on for a single
flighted on the off, drives it down towards long-on for one more
short of a length on middle, punched towards long-on for a single
flighted outside off, drives it back to the bowler
back to Jadeja again, shortish, quicker through the air and he punches it down
turns the face to play it through square leg for a single
sliding on the leg stump, tickled down to fine leg for a single
short of a length outside off, cut away towards deep point for a couple
short of a length on the off, punched from the crease towards long-off for a single
shortish outside off, cuts it straight to point
short of a length outside off, pulls it towards deep square leg for a single
worked away towards fine leg for a single
short of a length on middle, pulled straight to midwicket
makes room and the bowler chases him, flighted and he drives it straight to extra cover
full toss on middle, smacked hard, picks the gap between deep midwicket and deep square leg for a boundary
pushed off the front foot towards extra cover, refuses the single
full toss on the off, above waist height and de Villiers gives it the treatment, sending it into the stands over deep midwicket
fires it short on leg stump, moves away and slaps it towards extra cover
bowled it on a length on the off, driven wide of mid-on for a single
short of a good length on the off, drops it in front of point and races off for a single
uppishly driven, bowled it full on middle, but it landed short of midwicket who is right at the edge of the circle
full on middle and leg, driven hard to mid-on, takes the single

gone! Nehra gets it to nip back in a hint after pitching, Parnell gets forward to crunch it through extra cover, gets an inside edge and onto the stumps, ends a bit of frustrating stand for India, worth 77
de Villiers continues strongly, full and wide and he crashes it between mid-off and extra cover for a boundary, he's nearing his century here
punched from the crease wide of midwicket for a single
low full toss on the off, pushed towards cover

hurls it short on leg stump, tries to knock it down into the leg side, is struck on the pads and it drops on the pitch, he picks it up and returns it to Sreesanth who tries to flip it back onto the stumps, noticing that Steyn is out of the crease, all in good humour of course
India are a wicket away from victory now, bowled it on a good length on middle and beat Steyn's attempted drive down the ground to crash into the stumps
bowled full on middle, moves away and digs it out just in time towards point
fullish on middle, driven wide of midwicket
makes room and cracks it back to the bowler
just manages to clear cover, full and wide, makes room and slices it over the fielder for a couple of runs
de Villiers gets to his century, an excellent knock in a hopeless cause, bowled it full on middle and he hammered it back past the bowler, between long-on and long-off, for a boundary
gets it towards square leg for a single
bowls it on a length outside off, makes room and crashes that past point for a boundary
Sreesanth oversteps and is punished, full and wide, in the slot and it's thumped past cover to the ropes, freehit coming, a marginal call again
misses, short of a good length, has a huge swipe but it keeps low to beat the swing of the bat
four more, full toss outside off, he moves away and caresses that past cover for a  boundary
short on middle, goes for the pull but it's one of Sreesanth's quicker deliveries, misses
driven wide of cover for a single, a missed run-out as Jadeja fails to aim accurately at the striker's end
full and wide, stretches to reach it but he's made too much room
Langeveld'ts striking this cleanly, full outside off, makes room and drills that between extra cover and mid-off to the ropes
shortish on the off, slaps it hard to long-off for a single
flighted outside off, digs it out just wide of extra cover, there's no single on offer there as Yusuf dives well
fired it full outside off and Langeveldt stood his ground and lofted him over extra cover to secure another four
short of a length on middle, punched back to the bowler
pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
low full toss outside off, drives it wide of cover for a single
brilliantly fielded at extra cover by Raina, it's full and he whacks it hard but can't beat Raina who gets his body behind it in time to stop a scorcher
full outside off, dug out towards point
full toss on the off, pushed straight to extra cover
landed on a good length, gets across and drives it to midwicket
short of a good length on middle, worked away past square leg for a single
pushed back to the bowler on the front foot
flighted on middle, moves away and knocks it back down the pitch
short of a length on middle, punched towards wide long-off for a single
flighted on leg stump, shaped up for a slog-sweep, missed and I can't believe it actually missed the stumps
Game over! Langeveldt charges down the track and mistimes an attempted chip over midwicket, ends up playing it towards Ashish Nehra who dives forward to take a good low catch
